name: TOILET QUEST - itch.io PAGE
description:
Presley's constipation causes him to Alt+F4 and he dies! Tragic!

You, the toilet, must help him get to Heaven since he's too fucking fat to fly there.

Jump through the aether and discover the weird world around you (that no other toilet would ever discover)!

(PLEASE NOTE THE BUILD ATTACHED HERE AS OF 10/1/2023 IS A VERY VERY OLD BUILD THAT PREDATES ANY RECORDS ONLINE)

This game is still indev rn
